text:
Sibling goals! Kim Kardashian’s little loves are the epitome of perfection.



The KKW Beauty founder, 37, posted a heartwarming picture of son Saint, 2, and daughter Chicago, 4 months, cuddling on a miniature couch on Tuesday, May 22.

Sometimes we all need hugs ❤️ A post shared by Kim Kardashian West (@kimkardashian) on May 22, 2018 at 9:09am PDT

“He loves her so much,” Kardashian captioned the Instagram photo of the tots, who sported cozy onesies as they leaned in close.

© Stefanie Keenan/Getty Images kim-kardashian The Selfish author frequently takes to social media to share precious pictures of her and husband Kanye West’s children. Most recently, Kardashian revealed a sweet snapshot of older daughter North, 4, holding Saint as they bathed together. “My babies,” the marveling mom wrote on Thursday, May 17.

Kardashian pulled in all three children for a photo on Mother’s Day. Although the businesswoman looked relaxed and chic in the black-and-white snapshot, she told her 111 million followers at the time that getting her kids to hold still was no easy task.

“You don’t even understand how many lollipop bribes this pic cost me…but it was so worth,” she gushed of the group shot on May 13. “Happy Mother’s Day to all the moms out there. I’m the luckiest mom in the world to have these three babies in my life!”

Kardashian opened up about the joys of motherhood in an app post on May 11. “Having kids has changed my soul!!” she gushed. “You learn so much about yourself from being a parent and you care more about the world you are raising your kids in.”

Related slideshow: Kim Kardashian and Kanye West’s Sweetest Moments With Their Kids
title: Sweet Siblings! Kim Kardashian Shares Pic of Saint and Chicago Cuddling
